unnormalised: Arrey bhai, mhajjea ghora laggi te naven pul bandhtat tem khup vhodd asa! Mhaka aikunk ailem ki tem sumar 2.5 km lamb astolem. Teache khambe khup zadd asaat, sumar 1.5 m diameter? Ani engineer sangtale ki tanim sumar 50000 kg steel vaparlem fokot ek sectionak! Pishem, nhoi? Mhaka asha asa ki tem traffic jam komi kortolem; atam tori, tem mhajem commute-ak ek 30 mins chodd kortai, kamit kamit!
normalised: Arrey bhai, mhojea ghora lagim te naven pul bandhtat, to khup vhodd asa! Mhaka aikuk mellâ€™lem ki to sumar don point panch kilometer lamb astolo. Teache khambe khub zadd asat, kiteak tor sumar ek point panch meter diameter astolo? Ani engineer sangtale ki tanim sumar pachaas hazar kilogram steel fakt ek section-ak vaparlem! Pisol, nakoi? Mhaka asha asa ki techak lagun traffic jam komi zateli; atam tor tea karannak lagun mhojea commute-ak sumar tees minute odhik lagtat, atam tor!
